emuInput.TitMainTitle: William Stewart Amoco service station with pennant banners and grand opening signs, Herron and Webster Avenues, Hill District
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper September 6, 1958, pg. A19, reads: Grand Opening - Activity is shown at the recent grand opening of William Stewart's beautifully remodeled Amoco Service Station at Herron and Webster Aves.  Visitors collected prizes, tokens and souvenirs during the three-day celebration, which attracted thousands of well-wishers. - Harris Photo."
